meanings.definition: Resembling a wasp in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The black and yellow stripes on the costume made it look wasplike.
meanings.sent2: The buzzing sound coming from the garden wasplike and intimidating.
meanings.sent3: The way she darted around the room, collecting items, was wasplike in its efficiency.
meanings.sent4: His sharp stinger-like remarks were wasplike, leaving a lasting sting.
meanings.sent5: The wasplike markings on the flower served as a warning to potential predators.

meanings.definition: Having characteristics similar to those of a wasp.
meanings.sent1: The aggressive behavior of the team captain was wasplike during the game.
meanings.sent2: Her pointed and sharp responses were wasplike, cutting through the conversation.
meanings.sent3: The way he hovered around the food table, guarding it, was wasplike and comical.
meanings.sent4: The wasplike speed at which she completed the task impressed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The wasplike focus of the student during the exam was admirable.
